author: dkhaywood
msg: some refactoring of remoting's encoding: same basic design, but renamed some interfaces (ByteEncoder -> DataOutputExtended, ByteDecoder -> DataInputExtended), plus extended API to make it easier to write Encodables (including ability to write/read arrays), plus built-in checking of stream to help detect incorrect Encodable implementations, plus built-in support for null checking

author: dkhaywood
msg: some refactoring of remoting's encoding: same basic design, but renamed some interfaces (ByteEncoder -> DataOutputExtended, ByteDecoder -> DataInputExtended), plus extended API to make it easier to write Encodables (including ability to write/read arrays), plus built-in checking of stream to help detect incorrect Encodable implementations, plus built-in support for null checking

author: dkhaywood
msg: can now boot up server for remoting (and have reintroduced SERVER_EXPLORATION etc so can install fixtures when running in-memory)

author: dkhaywood
msg: fixing versions in plugins and archetypes, from -alpha-4-SNAPSHOT to -alpha-5-SNAPSHOT
